Frédéric Chopin

Twelve Études, op. 25

1832–1835 · Chomiński 26–37 · Brown 78, 83, 97–99, 104

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 31'

  • 1. A-flat major
  • 2. F minor
  • 3. F major
  • 4. A minor
  • 5. E minor
  • 6. G-sharp minor
  • 7. C-sharp minor
  • 8. D-flat major
  • 9. G-flat major
  • 10. B minor
  • 11. A minor
  • 12. C minor

The études are spread over multiple entries in the Brown catalogue.

Brown catalogueétudes

98no. 7
99nos. 3, 12
104no. 1

  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50205 · Sämtliche Etüden · ed. Paul Badura-Skoda
